name: Armada Hoffler Properties, Inc.
description: Armada Hoffler Properties, Inc. is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in the acquisition, development, and management of properties primarily in the Mid-Atlantic and southeastern United States. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Virginia Beach, Virginia, the company has established a diversified portfolio that includes retail, residential, and office properties. Armada Hoffler is known for its commitment to sustainable development and community engagement, which is reflected in its projects that enhance urban living and create vibrant spaces. The company’s property management division ensures that its assets are well-maintained and operate efficiently, contributing to long-term value for shareholders. Armada Hoffler focuses on creating high-quality, mixed-use developments that provide essential services and amenities to their surrounding communities. As a publicly traded REIT, Armada Hoffler offers investors an opportunity to participate in the growth of the real estate market while benefiting from regular dividend income. The company is dedicated to transparency and actively engages with its investors to keep them informed about its strategy and performance.
